title: The Secret Garden
description: A timeless classic about a young girl who discovers a hidden garden on her uncle's estate, unlocking its mysteries and finding solace within its walls.

title: Into the Wild
description: Follow the journey of Christopher McCandless as he abandons his conventional life and ventures into the Alaskan wilderness, seeking truth and self-discovery.

title: The Great Gatsby
description: Set in the roaring twenties, this novel explores the decadence and disillusionment of the American Dream through the eyes of Jay Gatsby and narrator Nick Carraway.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
description: Harper Lee's masterpiece delves into themes of racial injustice and moral growth in the deep South, as seen through the eyes of young Scout Finch.
